name: Angular Basics
description: Introduction to Angular framework and its core concepts.

lessons.name: Getting Started with Angular
lessons.description: Setting up the environment and your first Angular app.

lessons.name: Angular Components
lessons.description: Understanding components and building a user interface.

lessons.name: Data Binding and Directives
lessons.description: Data manipulation and directives usage in Angular.

name: Angular Advanced Topics
description: Dive into advanced Angular features and performance optimization.

lessons.name: State Management with NgRx
lessons.description: Managing application state with the NgRx library.

lessons.name: Angular Animations
lessons.description: Enhancing user experience with Angular animations.

lessons.name: Angular Universal for SSR
lessons.description: Implementing server-side rendering with Angular Universal.

name: Introduction to Doughnut Racing
description: Fundamentals of doughnut racing, including history and basic techniques.

lessons.name: History of Doughnut Racing
lessons.description: Exploring the origins and evolution of doughnut racing.

lessons.name: Doughnut Racing Techniques
lessons.description: Basic techniques and strategies used in competitive doughnut racing.

lessons.name: Doughnut Racing Safety
lessons.description: Safety measures and best practices in doughnut racing.

name: Doughnut Racing Tactics
description: Advanced strategies and competitive tactics in doughnut racing.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Doughnut Design
lessons.description: Designing doughnuts for optimal racing performance.

lessons.name: Racing Doughnut Nutrition
lessons.description: Nutritional strategies for peak doughnut racing.

lessons.name: Doughnut Racing Psychology
lessons.description: Psychological techniques to enhance racing performance.

name: Doughnut Drift Racing in Zero Gravity
description: Master the art of zero-gravity doughnut racing with advanced drift techniques.

lessons.name: Zero-G Doughnut Dynamics
lessons.description: Understanding the physics of doughnut motion in a weightless environment.

lessons.name: Astronautical Doughnut Customization
lessons.description: Designing your racing doughnut with rocket boosters and space-worthy sprinkles.

lessons.name: Orbiting Obstacle Courses
lessons.description: Navigating through asteroid fields and black holes without spilling your frosting.

name: Time-Traveling Doughnut Rally
description: Race your doughnut through the fabric of time, from the age of dinosaurs to futuristic cities.

lessons.name: Prehistoric Doughnut Safari
lessons.description: Evade the T-rex and race past volcanoes with your stone-aged doughnut.

lessons.name: Medieval Doughnut Jousting
lessons.description: Equip your doughnut with a lance and shield for medieval tournaments.

lessons.name: Futuristic Doughnut Hyperloops
lessons.description: Compete in high-speed races through neon-lit hyperloop tracks.

name: Jazz Music Fundamentals
description: Core principles of jazz music theory and performance.

lessons.name: Introduction to Jazz
lessons.description: Overview of jazz history and its impact on music.

lessons.name: Jazz Improvisation
lessons.description: Techniques and theory behind jazz improvisation.

lessons.name: Jazz Band Ensemble Play
lessons.description: Working as a team in a jazz ensemble setting.

name: Advanced Jazz Techniques
description: Exploring complex jazz techniques and modern jazz trends.

lessons.name: Modal Jazz Explorations
lessons.description: Understanding and applying modal jazz techniques.

lessons.name: Jazz Fusion and Genre Blending
lessons.description: Mixing jazz with other musical genres for a unique sound.

lessons.name: Jazz Performance and Stage Presence
lessons.description: Techniques for live performance and engaging audiences.
